scripts.less: rimraf dist/rmit/css && mkdirp dist/rmit/css && lessc src/rmit/clientlibs/clientlib-site/main.less  dist/rmit/css/main.css && lessc  src/rmit/index.less  dist/rmit/css/index.css
scripts.uglify_vendor: mkdirp dist/rmit/js && uglifyjs src/rmit/clientlibs/vendor/jquery.js src/rmit/clientlibs/vendor/jquery.focuspoint.js src/rmit/clientlibs/vendor/vue.js  src/rmit/clientlibs/vendor/bootstrap/src/js/*.js -m -c -o dist/rmit/js/vendor.min.js
scripts.icons: mkdirp src/rmit/clientlibs/clientlib-site/resources/images/icons && mkdirp dist/rmit/images/icons && svgo -f src/rmit/images/icons && svgo -f src/rmit/images/icons/icons-from-invision/ && svgo -f src/rmit/images/icons/rmit-nkd-comm/ && rimraf rmit/images && mkdirp rmit/images && svg-sprite-generate -d src/rmit/images/icons -o rmit/images/icons.svg
scripts.serve: cd dist/rmit && browser-sync start --index pages/index.html --server --reload-delay 2000 --files 'dist/rmit/css/*.css, js, hbs, images, fonts, pages' && cd ..
scripts.build:prod: npm run copy:css && npm run copy:compcss && npm run copy:cssfonts && npm run copy:vendorjs &&  npm run copy:compjs
scripts.build:images: npm run imagemin && npm run copy:images
scripts.build:all: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:images && npm run copy:font && npm run build:hbs
scripts.watch:all: npm-run-all --parallel serve  watch:css watch:js watch:pages watch:hbs watch:images
scripts.hbs: rimraf dist/rmit/pages && mkdirp dist/rmit/pages && node hbs.js
scripts.postinstall: mkdirp rmit && npm run build:all && npm run watch:all
